summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4866 for the improvement of the alley in block 44, Supplemental Plat of Pontius' 2nd Addition, being the alley from East Republican Street to East Mercer Street, between Belmont Avenue North and Summit Avenue North; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 55907, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
